text: Vila Luminis offers a cozy museum with a focus on local history. The exhibits are well-curated and provide an intimate experience. It's a peaceful stop for those interested in the region's past.
name: Elena Ionescu

text: It’s a bit disappointing that you can’t go inside, but the castle’s exterior more than makes up for it. The design is beautiful, and the area around it is lovely to explore. A quick stop if you're nearby.
name: Mihai Vasile

text: The museum at Castelul Stirbey offers a rich historical experience, showcasing artifacts from the castle’s past. The displays are well-organized making it a worthwhile visit.
name: Ioana Urs
